mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_no customerNo, c.customer_id customerId, c.customer_pw customerPw, d.customer_name customerName, d.customer_email customerEmail, d.customer_birth customerBirth, d.customer_address customerAddress, d.customer_gender customerGender, d.customer_phone customerPhone, d.customer_height customerHeight, d.customer_weight customerWeight, d.updatedate customerUpdatedate FROM customer c JOIN customer_detail d ON c.customer_no = d.customer_no WHERE d.customer_no = #{customerNo}
